Text.Page: I'm drowning in work here! Of course, by "I," I mean "you."<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Crazybearsayswhatnow?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

We're both part of the federation, yes? So my work is yours!

That's how the military works, pup. Don't think too hard about it and you'll go far.

My job is cutting the cult's chain of commandâ€”specifically the {@LinkCreature:17#300442#Heavens Fall guards}. If we kill some, and a few {@LinkCreature:17#300552#barrelhead threshers} to boot, they'll have to fall back to reorganize.

So, slip onto the farm, slit some throats, and watch the chaos. Oh, and bring me their weapons!

Nice work! As my C.O. would say, ruin the discipline and you ruin the unit! A wise man, Puran. You'd like him. Keeps us alive!

Now, how else can we trip them up?
